PSCT.Base: Discard 1 card; roll a six-sided die, then Special Summon, from your hand and/or Deck, 1 or 2 "Speedroid" monsters whose total Levels equal the result, but negate their effects. If you do not Special Summon, you lose LP equal to the result x 500. You can only activate 1 "Speedroid Wheel" per turn.
